edu.stanford.math.plex

Class Cone

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.math.plex.SimplexStream
      • edu.stanford.math.plex.Cone
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Simplex>, java.util.Iterator<Simplex>

    public class Cone
extends SimplexStream
    The class Cone provides support for computing persistence across a filtration as well as a cone over this filtration. This has uses in computing relative homology as well as in computing cohomology and relative cohomology. See de Silva-Vejdemo Johansson (forthcoming) for details.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class edu.stanford.math.plex.SimplexStream
